A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How disappointing. You can tell Disney has taken over the series. Too much comedy and forced humor. This came off as almost as a kids movie. I was surprised to read all the reviews and see that most fans had the same opinion. I pray Disney or whoever sees how unwell this movie went over with th fan base and can save it. Underdeveloped characters. Pointless side plot. Rose is the stupidest character in any Star Wars movie so far.
